about_the_game:
Wander through dark corridors, look into abandoned editing rooms, penetrate dusty archives and uncover the secrets of the movie studio and its employees.
Collect puzzle pieces: Study notes, letters, photos, listen to audio recordings to understand what happened on the set of the cursed movie.
Solve puzzles. Come face to face with fear: You'll encounter ghosts of the past, reanimated nightmares, and what lurks in the depths of the human subconscious.
Your actions matter: The choices you make will determine not only the fate of the protagonist, but also the fate of the dead actor's soul.
Features:
Unique atmosphere of psychological horror: Immerse yourself in the world of old movies, where the boundaries of reality are erased and fear takes shape and voice.
Deep plot with unexpected twists and turns: Uncover secrets, learn the truth about the cursed movie and the fate of the actor who gave his soul to it.
High-quality graphics and sound: Realistic picture and atmospheric sound create the effect of complete immersion, making you believe in the reality of what is happening.
This is not just a game. It's a one-way ticket to a world where fear comes to life on film and you become its unwitting spectator. Do you dare to take your place in the audience?”

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
